title: User Registration - Database Persistence
description: Verify that when a user registers, their data is saved to localStorage 'users' table and persists after page refresh

steps.description: Navigate to http://localhost:5173/register
Input name: 'Test User', email: 'testuser@example.com', password: 'password123', confirmPassword: 'password123'
Click 'Create Account' button
Verify redirect to dashboard occurs
Open browser console and check localStorage.getItem('users') contains the new user
Verify the user object has id, name, email, and created_at fields
Refresh the page
Verify the user is still logged in (session persists)
Verify localStorage.getItem('users') still contains the user data

title: User Registration - Current User Session
description: Verify that after registration, the current user session is properly set in localStorage

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Complete registration form with valid data
Submit registration
Check localStorage.getItem('career_improver_current_user') is set
Verify the current user object matches the registered user data

title: Database Version Update - User Data Preservation
description: Verify that when database version changes, existing user data is preserved or users can re-register

steps.description: Check current localStorage data for 'db_version' and 'users' table
Document the database version and user count
Register a new user
Verify user is added to the users table
Simulate database version change by manually changing db_version in localStorage
Refresh the page
Verify what happens to user data - either preserved or cleared (document behavior)
